alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 2:24PM CDT until August 03 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marion County in northwestern Alabama... Fayette County in west central Alabama... Lamar County in west central Alabama... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 224 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Detroit to near Eldridge, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winfield, Fayette, Vernon, Sulligent, Millport, Guin, Berry, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Kennedy, Detroit, Belk, Beaverton, Gu- Win, Bankston, Bluff, Ashcraft Corner, Boley Springs, Blooming Grove and Lamar County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
